segments.text: Can you help me pick out a gift for my niece ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most normal little girls go wild over Barbie dolls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Let me see one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's the latest model â€” Digital Barbie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , she's nice . How much is she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that's reasonable . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excellent . Would you like anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The total will be $ 32.42 . Will that be cash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's your change . Thank you for shopping with us .
segments.speaker: S2
